dungeonette.generator

Class PassageCarver

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonette.generator.PassageCarver

  • public class PassageCarver
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to generate passages between existing rooms. Only run after ALL rooms have been generated!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PassageCarver() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int checkForAWallPass(int cx, int cy, int wallPasses, char dir, char[][] tiles)
      This method checks wether a wall tile is about to be passaed.
      static void processAllRoutes(Floor floor, Specification spec)
      This method draws out the passages between the rooms AFTER all rooms have been placed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PassageCarver

        public PassageCarver()

    • Method Detail

      • processAllRoutes

        public static void processAllRoutes(Floor floor,
                                    Specification spec)
        This method draws out the passages between the rooms AFTER all rooms have been placed.
        Parameters:
        floor - floor being carved
        spec - specification for the dungeon containing the floor

      • checkForAWallPass

        public static int checkForAWallPass(int cx,
                                    int cy,
                                    int wallPasses,
                                    char dir,
                                    char[][] tiles)
        This method checks wether a wall tile is about to be passaed. It also surrounds any such floor tile with walls which has a blank '.' tile next to it.
        Parameters:
        cx - carver x coordinate
        cy - carver y coordinate
        wallPasses - current number of wallpasses
        dir - current direction of the carving
        tiles - two dimensional char array of tiles being processed
        Returns:
        updated number of wallpasses (the int might stay the same!)
